game.name: Dust & Dice
game.shortDescription: Dust & Dice is a mix of a roguelike deck builder and a Wild West-style dice game. Build your deck and roll the dice to determine your fate. Use strategic cards and poker-inspired dice combinations to survive challenging turn-based duels.
